text: "I'm Just Here for the Music" is a song by American singer and dancer Paula Abdul. It was released on May 8, 2009 by Filament Entertainment Group. The track was produced by Oliver Leiber, who produced Abdulâ€™s debut album Forever Your Girl (1988). The song was originally an unreleased song cut from Australian singer Kylie Minogue's ninth album Body Language (2003). ==Live performance== In May 2009, Abdul performed the song on American Idol. ==Charts== Chart (2009) Peak position ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Paula Abdul songs Category:Kylie Minogue songs Category:R&B; songs
title: I'm Just Here for the Music
